website_summaries.verdict: The Dell SE2716H is a slick-looking, 27-inch, curved-screen monitor that delivers robust, albeit skewed, colors against an inky black background.
cons: Middling color accuracy on our tests

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than my more expensive 144hz gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these to sit next to my more expensive ASUS gaming monitor with 144hz refresh. Ended up getting rid of the ASUS and getting another of these. I couldn't tell the difference when playing many kinds of games. Also the bevel on this was much thinner and the base is a much cleaner style that doesn't clutter up my desk. While the base doesn't have much in the way of adjustments, for me it's where I would have adjusted it anyway. No dead pixels on either of the two I bought. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: David Low

customer_reviews.title: Good low end 27 inch monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor seems to do it's job just fine. No dead pixels so far on the four I've purchased, three from here and one from a local retailer. Light bleed and flash-lighting is minimal but if you're looking for something perfect then this is not the one for you. You will have spend far more $$$. I game on this monitor but it is NOT a gaming monitor. This is a product meant for business use. It gets the job done, always turns on and works well. Color is not 100% consistent from monitor to monitor so will need some adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love this the only complaint I have is that every ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this the only complaint I have is that every so often the screen goes black for a second. Don't know if this is normal or what. Other that that the picture is wonderful . I am very satisfied and would recommend this .
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Ink

customer_reviews.title: Very NIce picture screen for a 27 inch. Typical Dell Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a reasonably priced large monitor. The 32 inch models are not quite within my price range at this time. I went with this model and quite happy. I have an HP 27 inch and really seem very similar. So far so good. Hope it stays that way. I would recommend but you have a lot to choose from in the large screen market.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous12345

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, great quality, wish I had two of them!
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is large enough to split screen and not compromise either half, the quality of the picture is phenomenal, the settings give a lot of flexibility for whatever you're viewing needs might be, and the customer service getting this monitor was excellent. there was a mix-up with the HD cables that were sent, and they resolved it right away. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Is dell just trying to get rid of some useless cables?
customer_reviews.text: Includes a VGA cable and no HDMI cable, are you kidding me?!?!?! Is dell just trying to get rid of some useless cables?
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Samsung 27 inch curved!
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. It was between this one and the Samsung 27 inch curved monitor and I am SO glad I went with the Dell. The bezels are MUCH smaller and the stand is made out of a much more hefty combination of metal and plastic. The speakers are also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for Work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a second monitor for my laptop and it is great. The price is awesome and the screen is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best monitor for the money....hands down
customer_reviews.text: OMG...love this screen...perfect for home office...and watching youtube or movies is a pleasure..such a great price
customer_reviews.author: sm:)e

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Outperforms my previous monitor by quality and It does not get hot
customer_reviews.author: ProcessThyme

customer_reviews.title: Nothing amazing at all
customer_reviews.text: Dead pixels galore. Guess that's what I get for being cheap. If you can look past the dead pixels then it's pretty nice. the auto input mode can be a bit finicky though.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sleep and won't wake up.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor goes to sleep and when you activate the screen, I have to reboot computer each time a waste of money totally
customer_reviews.author: Luvtoshop

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for great price
customer_reviews.text: It's for my daughter, she likes it. Quality is great, it was very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ians

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose functionality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this monitor. Size, colors, brightness, and clarity are excellent for the price. It works well switching between VGA for my work computer, and with HDMI using my personal 13 laptop. The 27 inch size is perfect for seeing videos, pictures, or for that extra screen space when opening up multiple documents and windows.
customer_reviews.author: RI

customer_reviews.title: NO HDMI cable
customer_reviews.text: The monitor did not come with an HDMI cable and the VGA cable was VERY cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my product, except with a laptop (Samsung) and with an HDMI cable the screen is fuzzy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leigh Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Significant upgrade over my previous monitor. Looks great, simple, high rez, good and solid monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hain

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT COLOURS, GREAT PICTURES, GREAT AUDIO, WIDE CURVE SCREEN. THEN WHAT YOU WANT?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful image! The curvature is not as big a ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful image! The curvature is not as big a deal as some make it to be, but it's a gorgeous monitor. Only drawback: built-in sound is a little above average.
customer_reviews.author: Fr. Dismas Sayre, OP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor for cheap. Wish it had an option to raise and lower though. It only tilts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble base
customer_reviews.text: Well protected finish and screen, easy to assemble base. The base is quite sturdy. LOVE the big screen, easier to view large prints or dual pages of documents. The dual speakers sound great. A very good choice for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH BONISH

customer_reviews.title: ... monitor lots of work space and the price was great.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this monitor lots of work space and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Van Wassenhove

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy with product I wish I could adjust height though
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Left side is much higher than right. Cannot adjust the angle. Great monitor for its price.
customer_reviews.text: Left side is much higher than right. Cannot adjust the angle. I finally decide to put a piece of foam under the right side of its setting.
customer_reviews.author: s s.

customer_reviews.title: I don't care about 4k but still wanted a nice display so went with this Dell
customer_reviews.text: I don't care about 4k but still wanted a nice display so went with this Dell. Screen is great, sound is great. The curve sure is slick. I use it with a mac mini and ps4. Whats holding me back from 5 stars is clunky settings navigation, it takes way too many clicks to change the input source or change audio. A remote would solve all the issues. I would expect this from some generic company​, but Dell?
customer_reviews.author: NickQ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality display and audio
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. My son uses this for his gaming station. Good quality construction and audio as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a second monitor. Wouldn't buy it for gaming but great for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use the mo it or started to show horizontal lines. Need to RMA.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Colors aren't as good as my old IPS ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain. Works great. Colors aren't as good as my old IPS monitor, but it still looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and image is good, but not outstanding. Worth its value, just don't expect a pro quality image.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando M Campos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product with great price. I love it. Thanks, Thuc
customer_reviews.author: Thuc X. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty sure it is a great desk monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure it is a great desk monitor, but it does not have how mount it on the wall. It is just for desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations!!! Works like a dream, looks beautiful and high enough performance to keep up w my new Mac! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jnew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything is good, and the 50% discount is the point why i bought this minitor
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Curve's nice, but colors are bad
customer_reviews.text: The Curved screen definitely gives a really cool sense of immersion when playing videogames and watching movies but I could not get over how washed out the colors were. The backlight of the monitor itself just pushes through the colors making them less vibrant as if it was some sort of plasma screen. As a Graphic Designer, I need the most accurate colors possible and this just wasn't giving it. I returned it the same day and got the S2715h instead, that one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Roemello Agjmurati

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike my HP monitor, which was too reflective, this one has a surface that absorbs light. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for gaming, I connected my PS4 and played Uncharted 4, also connected my Dell Inspiron 7559 gaming Laptop and played Rise of the Tomb Raider and both games looks amazing with this Curved Monitor! For HD movies and TV series with Amazon Prime the picture quality is awesome! For the Internet, videos and music is excellent too, so this is the best monitor I ever had. The best price on Amazon for $229.00, excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Matos

customer_reviews.title: Good design and picture quality but not so good black ...
customer_reviews.text: Good design and picture quality but not so good black level. The screen looks grayish on youtube full screen. Not sure if that's normal with any led backlit monitor these days.
customer_reviews.author: Jit

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first 27" screen or curved screen monitor I have ever purchased. Though I don't think the curved feature has brought me any better feeling about using it, the monitor itself does a good job in showing the text or images. This item is not bought for my customer, but for office use. Our clerk like it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Musk

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! Have had for a few months now with no issues. Recommend for a home or work system.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D Wilson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. The setup was harder than it needed to be. Would be nice if I just plugged this in and it worked. Eventually it worked but it probably cost me half the monitor in time just to get it to work with my computer. It is also less curved than I expected. If i buy another one it won't be because I think this is a good monitor, it will be because I want a second monitor to match the first one.
customer_reviews.author: superpage

customer_reviews.title: Dell monitor does the job almost
customer_reviews.text: The picture/text is clear and the glare is reduced making it easy on the eyes. Sound is solid. I'm happy with this purchase, but do find two problems. The sound controls keep changing and sometimes are unresponsive. Sometimes I have to open the volume mixer to adjust and sometimes I can just lower it as usual. The monitor has no USB ports. Had I realized that, I would not have even considered this item, but I find that I can manage without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I love the curve concept
customer_reviews.text: I love the curve concept, but anyone expecting a noticeable difference with the curve should think twice. The curve is very subtle. I have yet to use it for movies, so maybe the curve works better there. Loved it so much, I bought two. Also 2 HDMI inputs plus audio for the price is unbeatable. One downside is that the menu buttons are hidden underneath and not very easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Display started flashing within 2 days. Returned and bought a different model.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as requested
customer_reviews.text: Bright, Sharp, Big. Perfect and just what I was looking for. Was packed well, delivered quick, and set up easy. This adds to the one I have already.
customer_reviews.author: Lee F Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Has an excellent picture and love the size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Curved Screen LED Computer monitor as an Amazon Warehouse deal. Has an excellent picture and love the size. Worked perfect when hooked up to my ACER desk top computer. Much better than my previous 24 inch monitor. Cannot really tell that the screen is curved. Easy to adjust the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp. Thin edge (relative to most) Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super sharp. Thin edge (relative to most) Cons: Can't raise it up or down. Hard to switch inputs. I don't know why one of the 4 buttons isn't an input toggle. It takes like 5 button clicks to switch from hdmi1 to hdmi2. Super dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are you sure it's not brand new??
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly big monitor!! You're basically getting a brand new monitor for the cheap! The picture in 1080p is beautiful and has no flaws!!
customer_reviews.author: Geek

customer_reviews.title: I love this screen
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen. It had been 8 or 10 years since I had bought a new one. This is marvelous.
customer_reviews.author: Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Not Working out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I started a new job and I now work from home. I waited 4 months open the package because i was working on my office space. I pulled the monitor from the box today and it continues to flicker on and off. Extremely frustrated since I can't use the monitor and I can't get it replaced. Shame on me for expecting a product to work after being boxed in the original packaging for 4 months... WTF!??
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cupery

customer_reviews.title: ... my previous Dell UltraSharpTMU2410 Monitor this one comes with better picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Comparing to my previous Dell UltraSharpTMU2410 Monitor this one comes with better picture quality. Please be aware that it is not an IPS Panel but VA panel. While providing better blacks and and shorter response time its viewing angles are not as great. Overall I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Markiz

customer_reviews.title: ... a fan of dell laptops but this monitor is great! We wanted a pc monitor similar in size ...
customer_reviews.text: not a fan of dell laptops but this monitor is great! We wanted a pc monitor similar in size to our imac and this fit. The picture is the best I have seen for the price. would recommend and buy again if needed another monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: So, so monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: 27" does not need to be curved, more of a gimek than a requirement, resolution only fair.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is fabulous great color and size to me my needs and expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: Great curved led screen, I have no complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: The Best in the West

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitor. Crystal Clear and the size is just right for what I need. Best ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: Using for PS4
customer_reviews.text: Could be more crisp of a display but great looking on my ps4
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Everything else seems great!
customer_reviews.text: The power core is kind of loosen, but it works if i don't move it around it around a lot. Everything else seems great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned monitor, since the left side of panel was dark
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this monitor I bought for my mom, since the left 25% of the screen was shadowed. My theory is that the LCD backlight wasn't working on that side. It is a low-cost monitor and in its functional state would probably be fine for watching movies, but 1080P HD resolution does not seem sufficient for a 27-inch screen. This is basically a 16x9 television panel. We will probably pay more money and get 2560x1440.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST I EVER SAW  !!
customer_reviews.text: great monitor ,i love its simplicity ,dell is great company with great products
customer_reviews.author: charles vidovic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this monitor. I inboxed it and had it setup in about 5 minutes. With my hdmi I left my current screen on the standard vga and my laptop on and poof a third screen lit up and the experience is great. I installed the software and it created a type snap to grid feature. I am in spreadsheet. Office docs and web. I am not a gamer and I am sure there are higher technology specs for resolution and refresh. I really like the picture it's crisp clear and a great buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tprince

customer_reviews.title: worst I lost the $32
customer_reviews.text: I Just got my new Dell screen, Sorry DELL your packaging for this screen was done by an idiot, The steel base is loose right in front of the screen so it is impossible not to damage the front screen, the thin foam will do no protection, I was in urgent need for that screen for my job but know I will need to buy an other one from a different brand this give huge problem, worst I lost the $32.00 for tax pay at the Canadian custom.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Arseneau

customer_reviews.title: Read the return policy!
customer_reviews.text: If you are tall don't buy this item. Tilts downward even when it shouldn't tilt (normal upright position tilts). This item does not raise or lower which is not in the description (don't order it to find out after the fact). Returned immediately and received a restocking fee from cyberMIND. Read the return policies. If I could rate it ZERO, I would!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: i'd buy a flat screen rather than his barely curved screen
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because of the following: The buttons on the button of the screen are very inconvenient to use (hard to press and find) It is not that curved, you can barely notice that it is curved. I'd buy a not curved one rather than this one because its not that cozy
customer_reviews.author: GeekyBunny

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service and even better pricing
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, excellent customer service and even better pricing. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: DuvalNole

product_meta.title: Dell 27 Curved Monitor SE2716H - 69cm (27) Black, UK 3 Year Basic with Advanced Exchange - Minimum Warranty
